description:
The course has been decided and the Raalgon are moving to attack the UPSF. As the two fleets draw closer, Yuriko uncovers the full measure of the disturbing truth behind the incident with the "red light." It falls upon the shoulders of Tylor and the crew of the Soyokaze to prevent the catastrophe that would occur should the UPSF and Raalgon engage in such a large-scale battle.
Source: crunchyroll
